name: TV Stars' First Shows Quiz | Name The Show | 10 Questions

questions.text: Before 'I Dream of Jeannie', Barbara Eden was a regular in this series.
questions.explanation:
How To Marry A Millionaire.

	With Lori Nelson and Merry Anders.

questions.text: Before 'Charlie's Angels', Kate Jackson was a regular in this series.
questions.explanation:
The Rookies.

	With Sam Melville, Michael Ontkean, Georg Stanford Brown and Gerald S. O'Loughlin.

questions.text: Before 'Hogan's Heroes', Bob Crane had a recurring role on this series.
questions.explanation:
The Donna Reed Show.

	'Dave', the neighbor.

questions.text: Before 'Dobie Gillis', Dwayne Hickman was a regular on this show.
questions.explanation:
Love That Bob.

	With Robert Cummings, Lisa Gaye, Joi Lansing, Rosemary DeCamp and Ann B. Davis.

questions.text: Before 'McMillan and Wife' and 'Kate and Allie', Susan Saint James was a regular in this show.
questions.explanation:
The Name of the Game.

	With Robert Stack, Gene Barry and Tony Franciosa.

questions.text: Before 'Night Court' and 'Magnum, P.I.', John Larroquette and Larry Manetti were members of the cast of this show.
questions.explanation:
Baa Baa Black Sheep.

	Robert Conrad also starred. The show was later renamed "Black Sheep Squadron".

questions.text: Before 'Family' and 'Family Ties', Meredith Baxter starred in this series.
questions.explanation:
Bridget Loves Bernie.

	With David Birney.

questions.text: Before 'Laugh In', Judy Carne starred in this show.
questions.explanation:
Love On A Rooftop.

	With Peter Deuel.

questions.text: Before 'Burke's Law', Gene Barry starred in this show.
Before 'Adam 12', Martin Milner starred in this series.
